biotools.summary:
Molecular formula assignment software for ultrahigh resolution mass spectrometry analysis of environmental complex mixtures.

Ultrahigh resolution mass spectrometry is widely used for nontargeted analysis of complex environmental and biological mixtures, such as dissolved organic matter, due to its unparalleled ability to provide accurate mass measurements.

bioschemas.name: MFAssignR
bioschemas.summary:
Molecular formula assignment software for ultrahigh resolution mass spectrometry analysis of environmental complex mixtures.

Ultrahigh resolution mass spectrometry is widely used for nontargeted analysis of complex environmental and biological mixtures, such as dissolved organic matter, due to its unparalleled ability to provide accurate mass measurements.

galaxy.summary: The MFAssignR package was designed for multi-element molecular formula (MF) assignment of ultrahigh resolution mass spectrometry measurements
